description:
Bananya and Droopy-eared Bananya meet the legendary Rainbow Bananya... along with her sister, Night Rainbow Bananya! To thank them for returning her wand, Rainbow Bananya says she`ll grant any wish for them... What will Bananya wish for?! Nyaaaaaa☆彡
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Bananya and the Legendary Bananya, Nya
Bananya to Densetsu no Bananya Nya
ばなにゃとでんせつのばなにゃ にゃ
